sessions.name: Tuesday 9-10am - Optimise Continuing
sessions.outline:
For those who have completed Optimise 1-8 subjects.

Optimise stream covers the following topic areas:

  • Lean - general Lean views
  • Problem Solving - how to identify and solve problems effectively
  • Quantifying - how to work smart
  • Spotting Wastes - what are wastes and how to spot them
  • Observe Objectively - how to make sure you are being biased in your thinking
  • Kaizen - understand the principlesbehind Kaizen and what needs to be done to support small, frequent changes
  • Higher Order Thinking - how to elevate team thinking to the HOTS
  • Standard Work - identifying and developing 'standard work'
  • The Toyota Way - wrapping up and understanding the Toyota Way.

sessions.name: Tuesday 10-11am - Enable Continuing
sessions.outline:
For those who have completed Enable 1-8 subjects.

Enable stream covers the following topic areas:

  • Tatts WoW -Tatts Way of Working
  • Lifecycle - workflow management general
  • Visual Planning 
  • Agile Ceremonies 
  • Team Work 
  • Definition of Done - defining done
  • Prioritisation 
  • Estimation - relative estimation
  • Metrics and Measures
  • Adaptive Planning 
  • Elicitation - writing good stories, story splitting
  • Elaboration - working with stories
  • Defect Management 
  • Testing - testing in continuous delivery models
